item.title: Bank Command
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“bank”))
{
if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970)
{
openUpBank();
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bank”))
openUpBank();

}[/code]

This is better code…so u cant bank in wildie

Read full topic

item.title: Bank Command
item.dc:creator: @YaNo YaNo
item.description:
@YaNo wrote:

I need some help on this one…
So someone on my server lost 9mill because he thought the the command “empty” puts everything in bank.
I was thinking of making a command that will put all your item’s from the bag in the bank.

I found this at case 145:

interfaceID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int removeSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int removeID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

some lines underneath that, i found:

else if (interfaceID == 5064) { bankItem(removeID , removeSlot, 1); }

So if some1 could help me with it?

Read full topic
